question: 22nd December 1939 was declared by Jinnah as “Day of Deliverance” for Indian Muslims to celebrate__:
option1: Approval of Muslim League proposed Federation scheme by Congress
option2: Approval of Muslim League proposed Federation scheme by Viceroy
option4: Reaching the first contingent of Indian troops in France
explanation: This day was intended to celebrate the resignation of all members of the rival Congress party from provincial and central offices.
